data.text: @SenRubenGallego A cry of US citizen to bring a Bill to amend section 301(g) of Immigration &Nationality Act to delete 5 years physical presence in US or reduce it to 3years,so they can  transmit citizenship to child (One Parent UScitizen &other alien)born abroad vide Consular Report of Birth

@SenRubenGallego So now we've got a US senator whose dad was a Mexican cartel boss, openly threatening violence against Americans if he doesn't get his way. (We've imported the third world—and now we ARE the third world.)  But be careful, cabrón: those who sow the wind shall reap the whirlwind!
@SenRubenGallego Rub what happened? you was all about the Epstein files, but now that all your friends got exposed you became so quiet about.

@SenRubenGallego Democrats also believe that:
Men can become women and women can become men

Assaulting law-enforcement, and vandalizing and burning buildings and cars is a peaceful protest

K!lling babies in the womb for any reason at any time, is OK

Deporting, illegals and foreign national

@SenRubenGallego Why not write legislation giving immigrants without any criminal record permanent legal status and make it the law?  No citizenship but legal to stay and work and raise their families. It would end much of our problems with deportation.
@SenRubenGallego Gallego will Trample over anyone to get to the TV cameras
@SenRubenGallego Lmao.  You're some fat little putz bootlicking in DC for this year only.  You aren't doing anything.
